name: 设置聚合表触发配置

labels.name: story
labels.value: 接口名称：聚合表-定时触发

parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'name': '设置聚合表触发配置', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(cms_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/dataconfig/aggregatetable/${get_extract_data(Aggregation_Table_Timing_Trigger_ID)}/triggers', 'method': 'put', 'json': {'realTime': False, 'triggers': [{'effectiveDateTime': '2024-01-04T06:39:56.000Z', 'frequencyValue': 1, 'frequencyUnit': 2, 'matchAll': True, 'condition': 'A2 * A10 == 852.016  ||  A10 - A2 !=  66.456 && A2 + A10   >  10  &&  A10  /  A2  < 10', 'conditionDetail': 1, 'frequencyCheck': False, 'triggerType': 1}]}, 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}]}
